sentence.Network_en: The eyes redeem the face from ugliness.
sentence.Network_cn: 这双眼睛弥补了他其貌不扬之缺陷.

sentence.Network_en: There have also been ugliness and injustice in corporate wielding of power.
sentence.Network_cn: 大公司在行使权力上也有过丑陋的事和非正义的行动.

sentence.Network_en: Cold and ugliness were a good tonic for relaxed sensibilities.
sentence.Network_cn: 对清心寡欲的人来说,寒冷和凄凉的景象正是一剂良药.

Nobody wants to look at the ugliness ., 谁也不想看这丑陋的东西.
ugliness , coexists with beauty , is one of the important elements in social life .摘要丑是社会生活中的重要组成部分，美丑相依才符合生活的辩证法。

other ugliness included teenage drug dealers , unlicensed bouncers , fake IDs for under-age students , teenage binge-drinking and standover gangs preying on those leaving clubs .其他一些丑陋的现象包括青少年毒贩子，没有执照的保镖，未达到规定年龄学生的假身份证，青少年酗酒以及恶棍敲诈勒索那些从俱乐部出来的人。

entry.def: If you say that someone or something is ugly, you mean that they are very unattractive and unpleasant to look at.

example.ex: She makes me feel dowdy and ugly.

entry.tran: （通常因涉及暴力、挑衅行为而）令人厌恶的，邪恶的，恶性的
entry.def: If you refer to an event or situation as ugly, you mean that it is very unpleasant, usually because it involves violent or aggressive behaviour.

example.ex: There have been some ugly scenes...

means.word_mean: 1. qualities that do not give pleasure to the senses
